Detailed Description

Root class of all pointee objects.

intrusive_list boost::detail::sh::block_base::inits_

List of all pointee objects that will later need to be initlialized to a specific block_header .

pool boost::detail::sh::block_base::pool_ [static]

Pool where all pointee objects are allocated from.

intrusive_stack boost::detail::sh::block_base::ptrs_

Stack of all block_ptr s on the heap that will later need to be initlialized to a specific block_header .
